SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Circle
A class representing a circle on the canvas.
Command
The Command interface defines a contract for executable actions within the paint application.
CommandCopy
The CommandCopy class implements the Command interface to handle copying the currently selected shape in the PaintModel.
CommandCopyright
The CommandCopyright class implements the Command interface to handle displaying a humorous copyright message.
CommandCut
The CommandCut class implements the Command interface to handle cutting the currently selected shape in the PaintModel.
CommandDarkMode
The CommandDarkMode class implements the Command interface to handle switching the application to a dark mode theme.
CommandExit
The CommandExit class implements the Command interface to handle exiting the application.
CommandLightMode
The CommandLightMode class implements the Command interface to handle switching the application to a light mode theme.
CommandMenuBar
CommandMenuBar is responsible for creating the "File", "Edit", "Accessibility", and "Help" menus, each containing different commands that the user can execute.(Constructor) This class implements the EventHandler interface to handle menu item actions, executing the appropriate command when a user selects a menu item.(handle method)
CommandNew
The CommandNew class implements the Command interface to handle creating a new canvas.
CommandOpen
The CommandOpen class implements the Command interface to handle opening a previously saved canvas file.
CommandPaste
The CommandPaste class implements the Command interface to handle pasting a copied or cut shape from the clipboard back into the canvas.
CommandRedo
The CommandRedo class implements the Command interface to handle redoing the last undone action in the PaintModel.
CommandSave
The CommandSave class implements the Command interface to handle saving the current canvas to a file.
CommandUndo
The CommandUndo class implements the Command interface to handle undoing the last action in the PaintModel.
DrawModeStrategy
A strategy class for handling drawing behavior in a painting application.
HelloApplication
 
HelloController
 
Highlighter
A class representing a highlighter tool used for drawing translucent squiggles on the canvas.
ModeStrategy
Interface representing the strategy for handling different modes of interaction in the painting application.
ModeStrategyFactory
Factory class for creating instances of different ModeStrategy implementations.
ObjectEraserStrategy
Strategy for erasing objects in the painting application.
Oval
The Oval class represents an oval shape that can be drawn, filled, and interacted with on the canvas.
Paint
Main application class for the Paint application.
PaintController
Controller class that handles user input and interaction with the paint canvas.
PaintModel
PaintModel is responsible for managing shapes in the paint application.
PaintProperties
This class represents the properties of a shape, providing the model for attributes such as fill color, border color, border width, and stroke thickness.
PaintStrategy
The PaintStrategy class provides a method to select and return an appropriate shape based on the currently activated mode in the paint application.
PaintView
The PaintView class represents the view of the paint application, extending the Canvas class to display the drawing area.
Point
The Point class represents a 2D point with x and y coordinates.
Polygon
The Polygon class represents a polygon shape with a specified number of vertices, a stroke thickness, and fill properties.
Polyline
The Polyline class represents a polyline shape, which is a series of connected points that form a continuous line.
PolylineModeStrategy
A class implementing the mode strategy for drawing a polyline on the canvas.
PrecisionEraser
The PrecisionEraser class represents a special type of squiggle used as an eraser tool for precise drawing.
PropertiesPanel
This is a class defining PropertiesPanel.
Rectangle
A class representing a rectangle on the canvas.
Scribble
 
ScribblePanel
 
SelectModeStrategy
The SelectModeStrategy class implements the ModeStrategy interface and handles the behavior of selecting and moving shapes in the paint application.
Shape
Abstract base class representing a shape instance on the canvas.
ShapeChooserPanel
ShapeChooserPanel is a control panel in a painting application that enables users to select different shapes to draw on the canvas.
ShapeChooserPanelButton
ShapeChooserPanelButton is a custom ToggleButton used in a painting application's shape chooser panel.
SmartShape
SmartShape extends the Squiggle class to provide functionality for creating shapes that can be finalized into closed polygons based on certain conditions, such as proximity of points and angular tolerance.
Square
The Square class represents a square shape, a special case of a polygon.
Squiggle
This class represents a squiggle on the canvas, which is an ordered set of points connected to each by a line.
Text
This class represents a Text shape that can be added to the canvas.
TextModeStrategy
The TextModeStrategy class implements the ModeStrategy interface and handles the behavior of creating and editing text boxes in the paint application.
Triangle
A class representing a triangle on the canvas
